item.title: Novelis Inc 10-K
item.description: Novelis Inc, which is in the Rolling Drawing & Extruding Of Nonferrous Metals [3350] industry, SEC 10-K filing on May 11, 2022 had 48659 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: fiscal - 477 instances million - 414 instances net - 405 instances 2022 - 382 instances financial - 370 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here.
